DOC.brief_summary: 1 . General : antibiotic prophylaxis : cefazoline ( Cefacidal™ ) 2 gram iv administer 30 minute surgery 2 . Laparoscopic surgery - least 5 cm overlap ( mesh diameter exceed hernia size least 10 cm ) - without anchor transparietal suture double crown technique
DOC.brief_title: Prospective Clinical Observational Cohort Study Evaluate Use Tissue Separating Mesh ( Proceed® ) Laparoscopic Ventral Hernia Repair
DOC.criteria: write informed consent patient his/her legal representative ventral hernia require elective surgical repair write informed consent 'hostile ' abdomen ; open abdomen treatment contraindication pneumoperitoneum emergency surgery ( incarcerate hernia ) parastomal hernia
